member.name: T:WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktop
member.summary: Encapsulates a virtual desktop on Windows 10.

member.name: P:WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktop.IsSupported
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the operating system is support virtual desktop.

member.name: P:WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktop.Current
member.summary: Gets the virtual desktop that is currently displayed.

member.name: M:WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktop.GetDesktops
member.summary: Returns all the virtual desktops of currently valid.

member.name: M:WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktop.Create
member.summary: Creates a virtual desktop.

member.name: M:WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktop.FromId(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns the virtual desktop of the specified identifier.

member.name: M:WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktop.FromHwnd(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Returns the virtual desktop that the specified window is located.

member.name: P:WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktop.Id
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier for the virtual desktop.

member.name: M:WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktop.Switch
member.summary: Display the virtual desktop.

member.name: M:WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktop.Remove
member.summary: Remove the virtual desktop.

member.name: M:WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktop.Remove(WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktop)
member.summary: Remove the virtual desktop, specifying a virtual desktop that display after destroyed.

member.name: M:WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktop.GetLeft
member.summary: Returns a virtual desktop on the left.

member.name: M:WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktop.GetRight
member.summary: Returns a virtual desktop on the right.

member.name: E:WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktop.Created
member.summary: Occurs when a virtual desktop is created.

member.name: E:WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktop.Destroyed
member.summary: Occurs when a virtual desktop is destroyed.

member.name: E:WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktop.CurrentChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a current virtual desktop is changed.

member.name: T:WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktopChangedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the event.

member.name: T:WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktopDestroyEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the and , event.

member.name: P:WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktopDestroyEventArgs.Destroyed
member.summary: Gets which virtual desktop was destroyed.

member.name: P:WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktopDestroyEventArgs.Fallback
member.summary: Gets the virtual desktop displayed after is destroyed.
